name: Grenades
effect_text: Targets point up to 1 M from attacker, Blast AOE, +2 to Shoot, 1 AP, 1 Damage

name: Jump Pack
effect_text: The model can ignore terrain and other models when taking Move actions

name: Medkit
effect_text: 1 model touching this model heals d4 Wounds or Horror

name: Stealth Suit
effect_text: If this model's base touches a piece of terrain, enemy models do not have LoS unless they are within 1 M of the stealthy model

name: Reinforced Weapon
effect_text: Reroll Fight hit roll Once per round

name: Overcharged Cell
effect_text:
Use item to overcharge weapon: On a natural 1, that weapon is destroyed.
+1 AP, +1 Damage, add Blast for this activation
